attributes.action: Abolish the Daylight Savings system once and for all
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It does not really seem to give any real savings, and if nothing else, results in a tired workforce who are "jet lagged". Abolish this now obsolete system, and flatten it. Flexible working should be allowed for hose who think it will really benefit them to get up an hour earlier.

government_responses.details:
